mapper.select:
select a.* from ma_config_table_p a
and a.hasnextrevision = 'N'
and a.releasetime is not null and a.obsoletetime is null
and a.hasnextrevision = 'N'
and #RELEASETIME:TIMESTAMP# >= a.releasetime and (a.obsoletetime is null or #RELEASETIME:TIMESTAMP# < a.obsoletetime)
and a.gnumber = #GNUMBER#
and a.masterguid = #MASTERGUID#
order by a.DATASEQ
select case cnt when 0 then 'N' else 'Y' end haverls from (select count(1) cnt from ma_config_table_p where releasetime is not null and masterguid = #MASTERGUID# )
mapper.insert:
INTO MA_CONFIG_TABLE_P(GUID, MASTERGUID, UNIQUEVALUE, DATASEQ, GNUMBER, HASNEXTREVISION,
CREATEUSERGUID, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME) values (#GUID#, #MASTERGUID#, #UNIQUEVALUE#, #DATASEQ#, #GNUMBER#, 'N',
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# )
mapper.update: update MA_CONFIG_TABLE_P set UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, DATASEQ = #DATASEQ#, GNUMBER = #GNUMBER# where guid = #GUID#;

update MA_CONFIG_TABLE_P set UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, hasnextrevision = 'Y' where releasetime is not null and obsoletetime is null and guid = #GUID#

update MA_CONFIG_TABLE_CUSTM_P set UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, hasnextrevision = 'Y' where releasetime is not null and obsoletetime is null and masterfk = #MASTERGUID# and masterguid=#ITEMMASTERGUID#
mapper.delete: delete from MA_CONFIG_TABLE_P where releasetime is null and aguid = #GUID#
delete from MA_CONFIG_TABLE_CUSTM_P where releasetime is null and masterfk = #MASTERGUID# and masterguid=#ITEMMASTERGUID#
mapper.update: update MA_CONFIG_TABLE_CUSTM_P set UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, HASNEXTREVISION = 'Y' where releasetime is not null and obsoletetime is null and TITLEGUID in #TEMP# and MASTERGUID = #MASTERGUID#
mapper.delete: delete MA_CONFIG_TABLE_CUSTM_P where releasetime is null and TITLEGUID in #TEMP# and MASTERGUID = #MASTERGUID#
delete from MA_CONFIG_TABLE_INFO where masterguid = #MASTERGUID# and tabletype = 'P';
mapper.update: update MA_CONFIG_TABLE_P set UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, UPDATETIME = $CURRENTTIME$, hasnextrevision = 'N' where hasnextrevision = 'Y' and obsoletetime is null and masterguid = #MASTERGUID#;
mapper.delete: delete from MA_CONFIG_TABLE_P where releasetime is null and masterguid = #MASTERGUID#;
mapper.update: update MA_CONFIG_TABLE_CUSTM_P set UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, UPDATETIME = $CURRENTTIME$, hasnextrevision = 'N' where hasnextrevision = 'Y' and obsoletetime is null and masterguid = #MASTERGUID#;
mapper.delete: delete from MA_CONFIG_TABLE_CUSTM_P where releasetime is null and masterguid = #MASTERGUID#;
